thread.title: French hackers intercept Siri and Google Now to control phones
thread.title_full: French hackers intercept Siri and Google Now to control phones

author: Rhiannon Williams
title: French hackers intercept Siri and Google Now to control phones
text: Internet Security French hackers intercept Siri and Google Now to control phones Researchers claim to have intercepted the digital assistants to control the iPhone and Android devices, broadcasting silent commands from 16 feet away Siri was hacked by French researchers who could give it commands from 16 feet away Photo: Apple
